item.title: UAV Application Development Based on Computer Vision
item.description:
• Developed a UAV application based on computer vision by which the UAV can be controlled by poses or gestures
  • Used OpenPose models (implemented by Python) to recognize the poses and gestures
  • Deployed a service based on real-time messaging protocol (RTMP) on a cloud server to deliver and process the real- time videos collected by the UAVs

item.title: Banada ðŸ¤– -- Smart Robot Design and Built
item.description:
• Realized face recognition and voice conversation functions by image recognition module and speech recognition module based on deep learning algorithms, which were deployed on the cloud server (AWS)
  • Completed the function of tracking objects and avoiding obstacles based on ultrasonic, infrared and other sensors
  • Developed a corresponding mobile Android app to monitor the robot and its surroundings, and accomplished the hardware development based on Arduino and Raspberry Pi
